data.name: Soulmate
data.detailed_description:
Soulmate is a Hack-and-Slash, Action Adventure where you use
Magic,



Guns,



and Blades.



Use strategic abilities in an Open World, to fight your way through Demons, and progress in an Emotional story. Soulmate is about what insanity can create, in a world full of coincidences.

Features


- Open World
Explore a beautiful, expansive, Open World, full of Demons, as well as Eye Catching Environments.

- Fast-Paced-Action
Use your blades in a Combat System full of Gore, and non-stop action.

- Boss Fights
Take on dramatic Monsters, wielding Fire and Flames.

- Story
Enter a world where coincidences (or Fate?), is ever-expanding, creating insanity.

- Art
Soulmate shows off an amazing World, full of detail and polish, with RTX, and DLSS.

data.short_description: Soulmate is a Hack-and-Slash, Action Adventure where you use Magic, Guns, and Blades. Use strategic abilities in an Open World, to fight your way through Demons, and progress in an Emotional story. Soulmate is about what insanity can create, in a world full of coincidences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 9400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: 1080p RTX Off at 60FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 9700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Additional Notes: 1080p RTX On at 60 FPS

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
